title: brOvarAdA
sahitya:
brOvarAdA shrI venkatEsha nannu shrI vAsudEva shrta pArijAta


anupallavi

  nIva jIvulaku nitya rakSakuDai kAvavEmi shrIkara dEva dEva


caraNam    bhakti rakti niraktula nE neruga bhaktapAla nA cittalella dIrcci 
mukta yOgivarAnakta cittavara mukti mArgamunu jUpi vEgamuga
